entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support specifying module context in EE #63000
  • Invalid Code Generation & Potential Parsing Error #62997
  • Convert to interpolated string escapes {} or is disabled #62988
  • Why my coding style preferences is not working on visual studio 2022 #62985
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio is not remembering all options between machines. #62984
    Backlog
  • Revise grammar and syntax model for `scoped` #62983
    17.4
  • Remove duplicate code between NavigationBarClient.cs and DocumentOutlineControl.xaml.cs to track text views #62980
    Backlog
  • Document Outline handle node expand/collapse state across complex edits #62979
    Backlog
  • Document Outline use default search and toolbar #62978
    Backlog
  • Document Outline show loading bar #62977
    Backlog
  • Automatic insertion of missing using directive uses CRLF in LF file if the new directive is the first in the file #62976
    Backlog
  • CS8604 Compiler Warning despite previous null checking against the parameter #62975
  • Regression in VS 2022 17.3 Preview 3 from Preview 2 when using a ref struct inside of iterator block #62973

Closed

  • Pasting in verbatim string doesn't properly escape double quotes #62969
  • Improve file structure view #36812
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.4-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #63001
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Convert to record #62999
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Obsolete ITemporaryStorageService public APIs #62998
    Area-IDE
  • Update VS Telemetry package #62996
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #62993
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Enable new inline rename by default #62992
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
  • Obsolete TextAndVersion.FilePath #62989
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid having to take locks repeatedly when cleaning out workspace #62986
    Area-IDE
  • Fix SuppressMessage not working on lambdas #62970
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Disallow types named 'scoped' #62968
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.3-vs-deps to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #62962
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #62961
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63002
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #62994
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62995
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • When pasting an unknown string into a string, if we decide to escape any characters, make sure we escape all characters #62982
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fixed incorrect identifier in example source code #62991
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Use the threaded wait dialog when synchronously blocking rename #62946
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Delete checks for IsInCommandLineMode #62951
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62981
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Move option code over to using snapshots #62959
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove FailFast when rename tracking state is messed up #62955
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Expose an internal export provider in the new solution snapshot helper #62954
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Revert "Generalize RoamingProfileStorageLocation to ClientSettingsStorageLocation (#62684)"" #62759
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move code off of HostLanguageServices in favor of HostProjectServices. #62949
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62974
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Comment out unused analyzer diagnostic id #62971
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62967
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Move BraceMatching data service down to Features layer. #62965
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62966
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62964
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #62963
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update Versions.props and PublishData.json for 17.4 P1 snap #62957
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Structural Error Cases for Lambda Default Parameters #62958
    Area-Compilers
  • Move to a simpler form of checksum->solution caching in the remote workspace layer. #62872
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62927
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support UnscopedRefAttribute #62783
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE
  • Unwrap the cause (inner exception) of operation canceled exceptions when reporting faults #61787
    Area-IDE
  • Enable source build for ASP.NET external access project #62956
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers
  • Clear ValueTracking on solution close #61815
    Area-IDE
  • Ban api #62921
    Area-IDE
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Test the EditorFeatures layer on net472 and net6.0-windows #61234
    Area-IDE
  • All text editor options are roaming #62753
    Area-IDE
  • `ref` parameters to `ref struct` types should be `scoped ref` by default #62778
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62886
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Issue delete and insert edits when changing parameters #62897
    Area-Interactive
  • Allow Roslyn to access any evaluation properties and items #62445
    Area-IDE
  • Ref fields feature requires ByRefFields runtime flag #62941
    Area-Compilers
  • [WIP] improve test partitioning #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
